item.title: ‘I don’t have money to pay for a death certificate’: My sister refuses to probate my father’s estate. What can I do?
item.description: “I recently received paperwork from a company that my father had invested in.”

item.title: ‘We fear people will end up in financial trouble.’ Americans will spend a record $20 billion via buy-now-pay-later during the holidays.

item.title: AI taking your job? That’s just what these CEOs want you to believe.
item.description: Companies spend billions on AI infrastructure they never fully use — then cut workers to cover up their mess.
